description: This service retrieves advanced ecommerce-related address details associated with a given phone number. It provides categorized address information, seen dates, and a comprehensive address history for alternate data-based verification workflows.
llm_summary: Phone to Address Advanced (Ecommerce) service maps a phone number to detailed ecommerce address history, categorized by type and including seen dates. Useful for alternate data verification and compliance workflows.
use_cases: Retrieve detailed ecommerce address history linked to a phone number for onboarding workflows.
Support compliance and fraud prevention by verifying ecommerce address information.
Enable alternate data-based KYC processes in financial services and insurance.
Verify ecommerce address history for identity verification workflows in government and private sectors.

request_schema.description: Mobile number to map to ecommerce address details.
User consent for accessing ecommerce address data

response_schema.description: Overall status of the API response
Unique request ID generated by the API
HTTP status code for the service
Advanced ecommerce address data associated with the phone number

addressCount.description: Number of addresses associated with the phone number

phoneToAddress.description: List of ecommerce addresses associated with the phone number

seenDate.description: Date when the address was seen
